00035 public class GameOfLife {
00036         
00037         public static void main(String[] args){
00038                 if(args.length < 3){
00039                         printUsage();
00040                         return;
00041                 }
00042                 
00043                 try {
00044                         int xSize = Integer.parseInt(args[0]);
00045                         int ySize = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
00046                         String fileName = args[2];
00047                         int gen = 1;
00048                         if(args.length > 3) gen = Integer.parseInt(args[3]);
00049                         
00050                         InputHandler inputHandler = new FileInputHandler();
00051                         List<String> inputDataList = inputHandler.parseInput(fileName);
00052                         
00053                         if (inputDataList == null){
00054                                 Logger.logLine(Logger.INFO, "Input file is empty");
00055                                 printUsage();
00056                                 return;
00057                         }
00058                         Logger.log(Logger.DEBUG, inputDataList.toArray().toString());
00059                         GameOfLife game = new GameOfLife();
00060                         Board result = game.processGens(xSize, ySize, gen, inputDataList);
00061                         Logger.logLine(Logger.DEBUG,"Generation " + gen + " board");
00062                         result.display();
00063                                         
00064                 } catch (NumberFormatException e){
00065                         Logger.logLine(Logger.INFO,"Incorrect inputs");
00066                         printUsage();
00067                 }
00068                 
00069         
00070         }
00071         
00072         public Board processGens(int xSize, int ySize, int noOfGen, List<String> input){
00073                 Logger.logLine(Logger.INFO,"Inputs - x:" + xSize + " y: " + ySize + " No. of Gen:" + noOfGen);
00074                 Board board = BoardFactory.getBoard(IConstants.CURRENT_BOARD);
00075                 board.initializeFromSize(xSize,ySize);
00076                 board.copyStateFrom(input);
00077                 
00078                 Logger.logLine(Logger.INFO,"Initial board : ");
00079                 board.display();
00080                 
00081                 List<Point> modifiedCells = new LinkedList<Point>();
00082                 Board newBoard = null;
00083                 
00084                 for(int i = 0; i < noOfGen; i++){
00085                         //Increase board size by one row on all sides
00086                         xSize = board.getXSize() + 2;
00087                         ySize = board.getYSize() + 2;
00088                         newBoard = BoardFactory.getBoard(IConstants.CURRENT_BOARD);
00089                         newBoard.initializeFromSize(xSize, ySize);
00090                         newBoard.copyStateFrom(board);
00091                         
00092                         //Logger.logLine(Logger.INFO,"Generation " + i + " board");
00093                         //newBoard.display();
00094                         
00095                         for(int x = 0; x < xSize; x++){
00096                                 for(int y = 0; y < ySize; y++){
00097                                         Cell cell = newBoard.getCell(x, y);
00098                                         int nCount = cell.getNeighbourCount();
00099                                         //Logger.logLine("No. of neighbours of [" + x + "," + y + "] : " + nCount);
00100                                         
00101                                         //No change for n=2 or n=3 and alive
00102                                         if(nCount == 2 || 
00103                                            (nCount == 3 && cell.isAlive())) continue;
00104                                         
00105                                         //Alive if n=3 
00106                                         if(nCount == 3 && cell.isDead()) {
00107                                                 modifiedCells.add(cell.getPosition());
00108                                                 continue;
00109                                         }
00110                                         
00111                                         //All others should be dead
00112                                         if(cell.isAlive()) modifiedCells.add(cell.getPosition());
00113                                 }
00114                         }
00115                         
00116                         //Logger.logLine(Logger.DEBUG,"Modified cells : " + modifiedCells.toString());
00117                         for(Point mPosition : modifiedCells){
00118                                 Cell mCell = newBoard.getCell(mPosition.x, mPosition.y);
00119                                 mCell.switchState();
00120                         }
00121                         
00122                         modifiedCells.clear();
00123                         //Logger.logLine(Logger.DEBUG, "Before Pruning");
00124                         //newBoard.display();
00125                         newBoard.pruneBoard();
00126                         //Logger.logLine(Logger.DEBUG, "After Pruning");
00127                         //newBoard.display();
00128                         board = newBoard;
00129                 }
00130                 
00131                 return newBoard;
00132         }

00136         public static void printUsage() {
00137                 Logger.logLine(
00138                                 Logger.DEBUG,
00139                                 "This is the Game of Life program. It can take up to 4 arguments:" +
00140                                 "<nCols> is a required argument. It is the number of columns in the input file" +
00141                                 "<nRows> is a required argument. It is the number of rows in the input file" +
00142                                 "<input file path> is a required argument. It is the path and file name which had the first generation of cells" +
00143                                 "[no of generations] is an optional argument. It is the number of geerations to process after the first generation. It defaults to 1, if not provded" +
00144                                 "Usage : GameOfLife <nCols> <nRows> <input file path> [no of generations]");
00145         }
